alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Lawrence (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:50PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Boyd, Lawrence, south central Lawrence, southwestern Cabell and northern Wayne Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 747 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from near Blaine northeast to South Point, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Louisa, Wayne, Chesapeake, Proctorville, Blaine, Beech Fork State Park, Yatesville Lake State Park, Barboursville, Kenova, Catlettsburg, Ceredo, Fort Gay, Webbville, Burnaugh, Martha, Durbin, Ulysses, Charley and Centerville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Kentucky between mile markers 189 and 191. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
